This is why I don’t typically like NTR. Everything, everything just conveniently falls into place for the “MC”, in this case, Ichinose every single time. Manager of Mika’s branch suffers a stroke so Ichinose is appointed interim manager.  Now Mika’s husband will have a job transfer, leaving them all alone. Before this he’s in the right place at the right time again. Wayy too convenient, it just takes me out of the story. The best part about this is his backstory. Everything else about this is just wayyy too planned in his favor.
Wow, some backstory. Actually a decent NTR story, but sadly the censorship is so shit. Feels like reading some sort of manhwa except it's in manga format.
